articles.description: SAN ANTONIO, Texas (WOAI/KABB) – A patient in their 30s died from the coronavirus after attending what's being called a "COVID party," according to a San Antonio health official. Chief Medical Officer of Methodist Healthcare Dr. Jane Appleby said the id…

articles.author: Kim LaCapria
articles.title: Richard Rose Dies of COVID-19, After Repeated 'COVID Denier' Posts - Truth or Fiction
articles.description: A Facebook user posted repeatedly that he did not believe COVID-19 was a risk; he contracted SARS-CoV-2 and died in early July 2020.
articles.content:
Claim
Circulating posts by a man named Richard Rose demonstrate his position that COVID-19 was a hoax; Rose died from COVID-19 in July 2020.
On July 10 2020, a number of Facebook users shared posts… [+5509 chars]

articles.description: ANTRIM COUNTY, Mich. , (WPBN/WGTU) -- The popular Torch Lake Sandbar has recently been announced as possible COVID-19 exposure site. According to the Health Department of Northwest Michigan, another Michigan health department contacted them about several indi…

articles.title: At Least 82 Coronavirus Cases Linked To Missouri Sleepaway Camp - NPR
articles.description: Kanakuk Kamps shut down its K-2 program after 41 campers, staff and counselors tested positive. That number has since doubled, according to county health officials.
articles.content:
A Christian camp in Missouri has been forced to shut down after dozens of staff, campers and counselors tested positive for the coronavirus.

articles.description: Two HIV patients who received a stem cell transplant and are now clear of the disease.
articles.content:
